title: Safe Haven
description: Serena runs away from an unpleasant life and an abusive relationship to a place where she can’t be traced. What she needs is peace and the luxury of feeling safe again, but her calm is shattered when she discovers someone is already living on her property. Someone she knew long ago. Someone who hurt her badly. The only man she had ever truly loved: Mitchell.When Serena’s despicable ex catches up with her and threatens her life, she must decide whether she should accept Mitchell’s protection and risk him being hurt, or push him away and break his heart all over again.
author: Ella Medler
